title: language_test2_05
prompt:
What is the best way to complete blank 5?

Some reformers ![dropdown:Drop_Down_553_62] Senate rules to only allow “talking filibusters,” where minority senators would be required to speak to the Senate throughout the length of the filibuster in order to prevent a vote.
feedback: The correct answer is “want to change.” The sentence should read: “Some reformers want to change Senate rules to only allow ‘talking filibusters,’ where minority senators would be required to speak to the Senate throughout the length of the filibuster in order to prevent a vote.” The spelling “wanna” is an informal slang compression and mispronunciation of “want to.”
